Title: May nai fai rang frer
Writer: Chayanop Boonprakob, Nottapon Boonprakob, Vasudhorn Piyaromna, Thodsapon Thiptinnakorn
Actors: Sutatta Udomsilp, Thiti Mahayotaruk, Thanapob Leeratanakajorn, Narikun Ketprapakorn
Plot: Super standard girl in school (May Who) is on a quest to win the love of a school senior heart-throbber (Fame) with her new-found friend (Pong). The only secret is that she can discharge electricity when she gets excited.
